index.title: <highlight>Best Cities</highlight> With Work-Friendly Cafes
index.description: Find the perfect cafe for mobile work in your city. Discover our curated list of work-friendly cafes with WiFi, power outlets, and cozy atmosphere.
index.description_with_country: Find the perfect cafe for mobile work in {{country}}. Discover our curated list of work-friendly cafes with WiFi, power outlets, and cozy atmosphere.

suggest.title: Request A City
suggest.description: Is your city missing? You can request it, so we know that there is a demand and we can add it to our site.

form.city_placeholder: New York City, London, Paris, etc.
form.email_description: Optional, so we can inform you if we have successfully processed your city request.

success.title: City successfully submitted
success.description: We will review your suggestion and get back to you soon.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: Please try again or contact us via email.

hero.title: Best <highlight>Work-Friendly Cafes</highlight> In {{name}}
hero.subtitle: What Are The Best Work-Friendly Cafes In {{name}}?
hero.description_one: We have found one work-friendly cafe in {{name}}. The cafe is selected based on reviews. Only cafe places that are suitable for working or studying are included. This means they have a laptop-friendly policy and provide WiFi.
hero.description_other: We have found {{count}} work-friendly cafes in {{name}}. The cafes are selected based on reviews. Only cafe places that are suitable for working or studying are included. This means they have a laptop-friendly policy and provide WiFi.

more_cities.title: Checkout Other Cities in {{country}}
more_cities.suggest_description: Then suggest it to us, so we can prioritize it on our site.

map.title: Where Are The Best Cafes To Work In {{name}}?

show.title: Best Work-Friendly Cafes In {{name}}
show.description: Looking for work-friendly cafes in {{name}}? Discover our handpicked selection of laptop friendly cafes with WiFi.

suggest.title: Suggest A City
suggest.description: Is your city missing? Suggest it to us, we will check it and add it to our site.

faq.title: Frequently Asked <highlight>Questions</highlight>
faq.description: If you have any questions, please contact us via email.
faq.city-added-order.question: What Is The Order How New Cities Are Added?
faq.city-added-order.answer: New cities are currently added based on size and population. We will add more cities based on demand and the availability of suitable work-friendly cafes. But you can suggest a city and we will prioritize it.
faq.when-suggest.question: When Will My City Be Added?
faq.when-suggest.answer: We will add your city as soon as possible. We will review your suggestion and get back to you soon.
faq.suggest-email.question: Why Should I Provide an Email?
faq.suggest-email.answer: Providing an email is optional, but it helps us to inform you if we have successfully processed your city suggestion.
